title: @Rito Login Issues
body:
Info, using new client, cant get past Authenticating. It only says an unexpected error occurred after a long time of waiting. I also cannot access the support page. Rito pls fix this game or hire me to :P

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: It fixed itself, or you guys fixed it....either way good job {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
